metadata.name: Potential Cookies Session Hijacking
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "-c" flag in order to save cookie data.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-c\\s' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--cookie-jar')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "-c" flag in order to save cookie data.
